1456591275071787015.text:
About 6 years ago I created a Perl library to allow @jsonschema implementations to easily use the official test suite.

Today, I'm mering a PR to the JSON Schema website to list a new Perl implementation... and it uses this library!

The code lives on!

1455900412662407168.text:
@GabbyMcNabb @platfarm_agtech @WineTasmania @farmOSorg @OpenTEAMAg @jsonschema Hey, @farmOSorg, I think I got an advert for your system. No idea why...
But regardless, if you need JSON Schema help, we can help > https://t.co/hs3UT8Bry0

1454008063707566085.text:
@mariadb @probablyrealrob We'd love to talk to you about using JSON Schema in MariaDB. Wouldn't it be nice to be able to validate more than just "it's valid JSON" using a schema?

Want to join us (@jsonschema) and Oracle/MySQL in defining extensions to JSON Schema for databases?
